name: Ryan Rana
title: Software Engineer & AI Enthusiast
bio: i'm interested in solving problems with agents, VLMs, robots & scalable systems. as a swe, i prioritize technical depth and high agency for improvement.
i'm doing cs @ Rutgers & i'm a med swe @ Centren Health, prev co-founder @ Mesh. I also built a lot of other cool software over many domains in the past 6 years.
when Claude can't debug my slop, i like to write, ski, craft & eat Chipotle. i'm always seeking geniune collobaration and connection.
